meta.description: Optimize the number of throat and nasal swabs to maximize the number of patients seen given time and discomfort constraints.

sets.name: SWAB_TYPES
sets.description: Types of swabs conducted at the clinic.

params.name: time_per_swab
params.description: Time in minutes required for each type of swab.

params.name: total_time_available
params.description: Total operational time available in minutes.

vars.name: num_swabs
vars.description: Number of each type of swab to be conducted.

objective.name: max_patients_seen
objective.description: Maximize the total number of patients seen.

constraints.name: nasal_swabs_minimum
constraints.description: At least 30 nasal swabs must be administered.

constraints.name: throat_to_nasal_ratio
constraints.description: At least 4 times as many throat swabs as nasal swabs must be done.

constraints.name: total_time_constraint
constraints.description: Total time for all swabs must not exceed the available operational time.
